nodes.text: Gorso the Nightmare King was a male Chiss Sith living during or after the Cold War.

Gorso the Nightmare King was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as a World Boss for Dark vs. Light system. Whenever the dark side of the Force reaches victory state on a server, Gorso the Nightmare King has a chance to spawn at one or more of selected locations on Alderaan alongside other Dark Side World Bosses. Though killing him is required for an in-game achievement, it is impossible to determine when his death took place.
